step.commandStore:
:: Get latest cl# C:\Perl64\bin\perl C:\BuildReport\GetLatestRevision.pl $SVNSOURCEROOT $BF_ROOT\latest_p4_cl.txt $BF_ROOT\latest_svn_rev.txt -d
:: Update last cl .set env "Ken_Mi_Env" "P4LASTCL=${P4CURCL}" "SVNLASTCL=${SVNCURCL}"
:: Update current cl .set env "Ken_Mi_Env" "P4CURCL=`awk '{if (NR==1) print $3;}' $BF_ROOT\latest_p4_cl.txt`" .set env "Ken_Mi_Env" "SVNCURCL=`awk '{if (NR==1) print $3;}' $BF_ROOT\latest_svn_rev.txt`"
REM Generate revision numbers used for p4 submit description in build promotion. REM C:\Perl64\bin\perl C:\BuildReport\GetLatestRevision.pl $SVNSOURCEROOT $BF_ROOT\latest_p4_cl.txt $BF_ROOT\latest_svn_rev.txt -d
REM Save the latest changelist numbers from SVN and P4 to temporary variables REM .bset env "P4LATESTCL=`awk '{if (NR==1) print $3;}' $BF_ROOT\latest_p4_cl.txt`" REM .bset env "SVNLATESTCL=`awk '{if (NR==1) print $3;}' $BF_ROOT\latest_svn_rev.txt`"
step.command:
:: Get latest cl# C:\Perl64\bin\perl C:\BuildReport\GetLatestRevision.pl $SVNSOURCEROOT $BF_ROOT\latest_p4_cl.txt $BF_ROOT\latest_svn_rev.txt -d
:: Update last cl .set env "Ken_Mi_Env" "P4LASTCL=${P4CURCL}" "SVNLASTCL=${SVNCURCL}"
:: Update current cl .set env "Ken_Mi_Env" "P4CURCL=`awk '{if (NR==1) print $3;}' $BF_ROOT\latest_p4_cl.txt`" .set env "Ken_Mi_Env" "SVNCURCL=`awk '{if (NR==1) print $3;}' $BF_ROOT\latest_svn_rev.txt`"
REM Generate revision numbers used for p4 submit description in build promotion. REM C:\Perl64\bin\perl C:\BuildReport\GetLatestRevision.pl $SVNSOURCEROOT $BF_ROOT\latest_p4_cl.txt $BF_ROOT\latest_svn_rev.txt -d
REM Save the latest changelist numbers from SVN and P4 to temporary variables REM .bset env "P4LATESTCL=`awk '{if (NR==1) print $3;}' $BF_ROOT\latest_p4_cl.txt`" REM .bset env "SVNLATESTCL=`awk '{if (NR==1) print $3;}' $BF_ROOT\latest_svn_rev.txt`"

step.elseCommandStore:
:: Save changelist numbers and continue build
.set env "Ken_Env" "P4CURRCL=$P4LATESTCL" "SVNCURRCL=$SVNLATESTCL"
.set env "Ken_Env" "BUILD_SKIPPED=False"
step.description: Skip Build If No New CL

.retag ${BF_PROJECTNAME}_${BF_D}_SKIPPED-NO_NEW_CL
.stop P

.retag ${BF_PROJECTNAME}_${BF_D}_SKIPPED-NO_NEW_CL
.stop P

step.commandStore:
::signer.py -r $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\Common ourcredentials.pfx adskBRE ::if NOT %%ERRORLEVEL%% == 0 goto END ::signer.py -r $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\Oem ourcredentials.pfx adskBRE ::if NOT %%ERRORLEVEL%% == 0 goto END ::signer.py -r $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\OS ourcredentials.pfx adskBRE
:: Kevin - Added loops, max 10 to get around timestamp server issues
@echo off
set RETRIES=10
:signcode_loop1 set /a RETRIES=%RETRIES%-1 signer.py -r $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\Common ourcredentials.pfx adskBRE if NOT %ERRORLEVEL%==0 if NOT %RETRIES%==0 goto signcode_loop1 if NOT %ERRORLEVEL%==0 if %RETRIES%==0 @echo Failed to sign $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\Common>>digisign.err
set RETRIES=10
:signcode_loop2 set /a RETRIES=%RETRIES%-1 signer.py -r $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\Oem ourcredentials.pfx adskBRE if NOT %ERRORLEVEL%==0 if NOT %RETRIES%==0 goto signcode_loop2 if NOT %ERRORLEVEL%==0 if %RETRIES%==0 @echo Failed to sign $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\Oem >>digisign.err
set RETRIES=10
:signcode_loop3 set /a RETRIES=%RETRIES%-1 signer.py -r $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\OS ourcredentials.pfx adskBRE if NOT %ERRORLEVEL%==0 if NOT %RETRIES%==0 goto signcode_loop3 if NOT %ERRORLEVEL%==0 if %RETRIES%==0 @echo Failed to sign $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\OS >>digisign.err
:END exit %%ERRORLEVEL%%

::signer.py -r $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\Common ourcredentials.pfx adskBRE ::if NOT %%ERRORLEVEL%% == 0 goto END ::signer.py -r $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\Oem ourcredentials.pfx adskBRE ::if NOT %%ERRORLEVEL%% == 0 goto END ::signer.py -r $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\OS ourcredentials.pfx adskBRE
:: Kevin - Added loops, max 10 to get around timestamp server issues

set RETRIES=10
:signcode_loop1 set /a RETRIES=%RETRIES%-1 signer.py -r $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\Common ourcredentials.pfx adskBRE if NOT %ERRORLEVEL%==0 if NOT %RETRIES%==0 goto signcode_loop1 if NOT %ERRORLEVEL%==0 if %RETRIES%==0 @echo Failed to sign $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\Common>>digisign.err
set RETRIES=10
:signcode_loop2 set /a RETRIES=%RETRIES%-1 signer.py -r $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\Oem ourcredentials.pfx adskBRE if NOT %ERRORLEVEL%==0 if NOT %RETRIES%==0 goto signcode_loop2 if NOT %ERRORLEVEL%==0 if %RETRIES%==0 @echo Failed to sign $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent\Oem >>digisign.err

step.commandStore:
REM Each p4 sync runs up to three times before giving up
echo %BF_ROOT%
subst u: /d
subst u: %BF_ROOT%
echo Log file is: %BF_ROOT%\P4_get_source.txt
REM echo Getting latest changelist from %P4SOURCEROOT%/... in Perforce repository REM p4 changes -m 1 -s submitted %P4SOURCEROOT%/...
echo Getting latest changelist from client:%P4CLIENT%/... in Perforce repository
for /f "tokens=2" %%i IN ('p4 changes -s submitted -m1') do (@echo %%i > $BF_ROOT\change.txt)
echo Getting code from Perforce repository
p4 -c %P4CLIENT% -p %P4PORT% -u %P4USER% -P %P4PASSWD% sync -f %P4SOURCEROOT%/... > %BF_ROOT%\P4_get_source.txt
if %%errorlevel%% == 0 goto done
sleep 300
p4 -c %P4CLIENT% -p %P4PORT% -u %P4USER% -P %P4PASSWD% sync -f %P4SOURCEROOT%/... > %BF_ROOT%\P4_get_source.txt
if %%errorlevel%% == 0 goto done
sleep 300
p4 -c %P4CLIENT% -p %P4PORT% -u %P4USER% -P %P4PASSWD% sync -f %P4SOURCEROOT%/... > %BF_ROOT%\P4_get_source.txt
:done exit %%errorlevel%%

echo Log file is: $BF_ROOT\Zip_files.txt echo Zipping Fdo files $FDOTHIRDPARTY/util/wzzip.exe -rP $BF_ROOT\$VERSIONNUMBER\${VERSIONNUMBER}-fdo.zip Fdo\* -xFdo\SubDocOld\* > $BF_ROOT\Zip_files.txt
echo Zipping Thirdparty files $FDOTHIRDPARTY/util/wzzip.exe -rP $BF_ROOT\$VERSIONNUMBER\${VERSIONNUMBER}-thirdparty.zip Thirdparty\* >> $BF_ROOT\Zip_files.txt
echo Zipping Provider files $FDOTHIRDPARTY/util/wzzip.exe -rP $BF_ROOT\$VERSIONNUMBER\${VERSIONNUMBER}-providers.zip Providers\* -xProviders\SubDocOld\* -xProviders\Raster\TestData\* -xProviders\GDAL\TestData\* -xProviders\Shp\TestData\* -xProviders\SDF\TestData\* -xProviders\ArcSDE\TestData\* -xProviders\Utilities\BulkCopy\unit_test\* -xProviders\Oracle\src\raster\GeoRaster\UnitTest\* -xProviders\Oracle\src\fdo\unit_test\* -xProviders\Oracle\src\fdo\unit_test2\* -xProviders\GenericRdbms\Src\UnitTest\* -xProviders\Utilities\Schema\src\UnitTest\* >> $BF_ROOT\Zip_files.txt
echo Zipping Provider Extra files $FDOTHIRDPARTY/util/wzzip.exe -rP $BF_ROOT\$VERSIONNUMBER\${VERSIONNUMBER}-providers_extra.zip Providers\Raster\TestData\* Providers\GDAL\TestData\* Providers\Shp\TestData\* Providers\SDF\TestData\* Providers\ArcSDE\TestData\* Providers\Utilities\BulkCopy\unit_test\* Providers\Oracle\src\raster\GeoRaster\UnitTest\* Providers\Oracle\src\fdo\unit_test\* Providers\Oracle\src\fdo\unit_test2\* Providers\GenericRdbms\Src\UnitTest\* Providers\Utilities\Schema\src\UnitTest\* >> $BF_ROOT\Zip_files.txt
echo Zipping Utilities files $FDOTHIRDPARTY/util/wzzip.exe -rP $BF_ROOT\$VERSIONNUMBER\${VERSIONNUMBER}-utilities.zip utilities\* >> $BF_ROOT\Zip_files.txt

step.commandStore:
echo RELW32
devenv FDO%VCBEXTENSION%.sln /build "Release|Win32" >> Build_release.txt
if NOT %%errorlevel%% == 0 goto END
echo DEBW32:
devenv FDO%VCBEXTENSION%.sln /build "Debug|Win32" >> Build_debug.txt
if NOT %%errorlevel%% == 0 goto END
echo RELX64:
devenv FDO%VCBEXTENSION%.sln /build "Release|x64" >> Build_release_x64.txt
if NOT %%errorlevel%% == 0 goto END
echo DEBX64:
devenv FDO%VCBEXTENSION%.sln /build "Debug|x64" >> Build_debug_x64.txt
if NOT %%errorlevel%% == 0 goto END
echo Creating FDO Unmanaged and Managed html and chm API documentation
if exist Docs\HTML\FDO_API rmdir /S /Q Docs\HTML\FDO_API
if exist Docs\HTML\FDO_API_managed rmdir /S /Q Docs\HTML\FDO_API_managed
mkdir Docs\HTML\FDO_API
copy ..\DocResources\geospatial.css Docs\HTML\FDO_API
copy ..\DocResources\geospatial.js Docs\HTML\FDO_API
copy ..\DocResources\osgeo.css Docs\HTML\FDO_API
copy ..\DocResources\FDO_architecture.png Docs\HTML\FDO_API
copy ..\DocResources\comment.htm Docs\HTML\FDO_API
copy ..\DocResources\comment.js Docs\HTML\FDO_API
mkdir Docs\HTML\FDO_API_managed
copy ..\DocResources\geospatial.css Docs\HTML\FDO_API_managed
copy ..\DocResources\geospatial.js Docs\HTML\FDO_API_managed
copy ..\DocResources\osgeo.css Docs\HTML\FDO_API_managed
copy ..\DocResources\FDO_architecture.png Docs\HTML\FDO_API_managed
copy ..\DocResources\comment.htm Docs\HTML\FDO_API_managed
copy ..\DocResources\comment.js Docs\HTML\FDO_API_managed
attrib -r Docs\FDO_API.chm
attrib -r Docs\FDO_API_managed.chm
cd Docs\doc_src
if NOT exist "c:\Program Files (x86)\HTML Help Workshop\hhc.exe" goto NOUPDATE
sed s'#HHC_LOCATION.*=.*#HHC_LOCATION = "C:/Program Files (x86)/HTML Help Workshop/hhc.exe"#' Doxyfile_FDOunmanaged > Doxyfile_FDOunmanaged_updated
del /F Doxyfile_FDOunmanaged
ren Doxyfile_FDOunmanaged_updated Doxyfile_FDOunmanaged
sed s'#HHC_LOCATION.*=.*#HHC_LOCATION = "C:/Program Files (x86)/HTML Help Workshop/hhc.exe"#' Doxyfile_FDOmanaged > Doxyfile_FDOmanaged_updated
del /F Doxyfile_FDOmanaged
ren Doxyfile_FDOmanaged_updated Doxyfile_FDOmanaged
:NOUPDATE
doxygen -u Doxyfile_FDOunmanaged
doxygen Doxyfile_FDOunmanaged > FDO_unmanaged.txt
if NOT %%errorlevel%% == 0 goto END
doxygen -u Doxyfile_FDOmanaged
doxygen Doxyfile_FDOmanaged > FDO_managed.txt
:END
set my_error_level=%%errorlevel%%
if not %%my_error_level%%==0 goto exit
cd ..
if not exist FDO_API.chm set my_error_level=1
if not exist FDO_API_managed.chm set my_error_level=2
:exit
exit %%my_error_level%%

if NOT %%errorlevel%% == 0 goto END

if NOT %%errorlevel%% == 0 goto END

mkdir $BF_ROOT\$VERSIONNUMBER
mkdir inc\Spatial
mkdir release
mkdir debug
xcopy /e lib\* release

copy $FDO\Unmanaged\Inc\Spatial\*.h inc\Spatial
copy $FDO\Unmanaged\lib\win32\release\FDOSpatial.lib release
copy $FDO\Unmanaged\lib\win32\release\FDONLS.lib release
copy $FDOUTILITIES\Common\lib\win32\release\ProvidersCommon.lib release
copy $FDO\Unmanaged\lib\win32\debug\FDOSpatial.lib debug
copy $FDO\Unmanaged\lib\win32\debug\FDONLS.lib debug
copy $FDOUTILITIES\Common\lib\win32\debug\ProvidersCommon.lib debug
mkdir xtra\providers\Oracle\inc\geometry\sdo
copy $FDOPROVIDERS\Oracle\inc\geometry\sdo\*.* xtra\providers\Oracle\inc\geometry\sdo
mkdir xtra\providers\Oracle\lib\win32\debug
copy $FDOPROVIDERS\Oracle\lib\win32\debug\geometry_sdo.lib xtra\providers\Oracle\lib\win32\debug

mkdir lib
move release lib
move debug lib

mkdir debug

copy /y $BF_ROOT\providers.xml release

mkdir bin
move release bin
move debug bin
set FDOROOT=$BF_ROOT
set CONFIG=debug
nmake -f $BF_ROOT\Fdo64SDK.mak
set CONFIG=release
nmake -f $BF_ROOT\Fdo64SDK.mak
move $BF_ROOT\bin\release64 bin
move $BF_ROOT\bin\debug64 bin

copy $FDOPROVIDERS\ArcSDE\Docs\*.chm docs

subst p: $BF_ROOT\Platform\Ent
cd $BF_ROOT
pwd
echo.> label.txt
echo Label: $BUILD>> label.txt
echo.>> label.txt
echo Owner: mgbuild>> label.txt
echo.>> label.txt
echo Description:>> label.txt
echo.>> label.txt
printf "\tLabeled for build $BUILD\n">> label.txt

echo.>> label.txt

echo.>> label.txt
echo View:>> label.txt
printf \t$P4SOURCEROOT/...>> label.txt
:: Debug type label.txt
cat label.txt | p4 -p $P4PORT label -i
if NOT %%errorlevel%% == 0 goto END
p4 -p $P4PORT labelsync -l "$BUILD" $P4SOURCEROOT/... > p4labelsync.log
:END
exit %%errorlevel%%

:: Debug type label.txt
cat label.txt | p4 -p $P4PORT label -i
if NOT %%errorlevel%% == 0 goto END
p4 -p $P4PORT labelsync -l "$BUILD" $P4SOURCEROOT/... > p4labelsync.log
:END
exit %%errorlevel%%

python UpdateMapComponentsFile.py --file=n:/buildcomponents.txt --fdo=%FDO_VER% --gis=%BUILD%
exit %%errorlevel%%
